entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Clyde River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -32.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023
